citations.narrative:
The three new enclosures added for the five Patagonian Cavies were built outside the 8 feet perimeter fence around the
other regulated animals. Proper perimeter fencing three feet away from the primary enclosures is necessary to maintain
unauthorized people and animals from entering the property. The perimeter fence also acts as a secondary containment
system for the animals in the facility.
To be corrected by May 15, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representative.
n

narrative:
3.127(d) 
   
Facilities, outdoor. 
The three new enclosures added for the five Patagonian Cavies were built outside the 8 feet perimeter fence around the 
other regulated animals.   Proper perimeter fencing three feet away from the primary enclosures is necessary to maintain 
unauthorized people and animals from entering the property.  The perimeter fence also acts as a secondary containment 
system for the animals in the facility. 
 
To be corrected by May 15, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representative.
